name: Free Bird (masli)
description:
Game made for ACGS Start of Summer (S.O.S) Jam.

Song:  Lynyrd Skynyrd -  Free Bird 

It's my first platformer game. Also is the first time when i made all the arts in a game. So, be nice to this game and play it at least 5 minutes :)

The game has some bugs (small bugs) but i have to publish this game 1 day before submision ending. Maybe in 2-3 days, i will manage to repair the bugs and add some new features, adding new graphics (maybe a new background cave:) ) .. who knows!?

Enjoy the game!
